system.sustained: Psyker fires a Psychic barrage of one bolt, +1 per two degrees of Success on Focus Power Test up to a maximum number of bolts equal to their Psy Rating. The first hits their target, with each further bolt hitting the target or anyone within 2 metres of them (can be dodged as if semi-auto ranged attack). Each bolt deals 1d10 + Toughness Bonuss Damage with Psy Rating Penetration. If succeeding Focus Power Test by 3+ DoS, can add either the Shocking or Haywire Qualities to the damage, with 5+ DoS, add both.
